messages.subject: a little boy with a wagon of sunflowers
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/13/04 3:22:32 AM, pamsoroosh@mac.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/13/04 3:22:32 AM, pamsoroosh@... writes:

<<
My dh grew up in Iran - in a small town. He didn't have toys. But when
he was about 6 years old he made a little pull wagon from a flat wooden
box and some little wheels. He filled it with dirt and planted
sunflower seeds in it and they grew into big beautiful sunflower plants
which he pulled around behind him everywhere he went. To me, that
image, of a little boy pulling sunflowers around in a little homemade
wagon, is just so very sweet!!!

-pam
>>

WOW.
That is one of the prettiest word-images ever.

I sent to a dozen and some of my friends, especially to the artists and story
tellers, because that's an image that should be passed on!!

Sandra
